name: MGroup - Shopify Development
description:
MGroup is an expert in e-commerce and provides a full package of services for small and medium-sized businesses, that prefer to manage all their technological needs in one place. We know, that your success is our success, and direct strategy is important in achieving this.
Our development team will bring your ideas to life seamlessly, rendering professionally on popular browsers on the web, mobile and tablet devices.
We offer full-cycle e-сommerce development via Shopify, starting from in-depth analysis to completed business systems, fully adjusted to customer needs and ready to launch. As well, we build websites which help businesses improve their key metrics and represent their brands with pride.
Key Services:
E-commerce consulting
Shopify Theme development
Making custom widgets and features
Shopify Application development and integration (creation of custom applications to meet specific business needs and increase the store functionality)
Shopify Plus scripts
Post launch support (css & styling changes, design support, ongoing feature recommendations)
E-commerce website optimization (conversion rate optimization, SEO analytics)
Shopify has been our main area of expertise for more than 5 years. MGroup has already joined to Shopify Partner Program and Shopify Experts. We have a lot of successfully completed e-commerce projects of any complexity, from basic store setups to complex integrations.
Let’s get started on building a successful financially future!
